scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:copy && bun run build:bundle
scripts.build:copy: mkdir -p dist/popup dist/icons dist/content && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp popup/popup.html popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && cp content/styles.css dist/content/ && cp -r icons/* dist/icons/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:bundle: bun build background/service-worker.ts --outdir dist/background --target browser && bun build content/twitter.ts --outdir dist/content --target browser && bun build content/linkedin.ts --outdir dist/content --target browser && bun build popup/popup.ts --outdir dist/popup --target browser
scripts.package: bun run build && bun run package:zip
scripts.test:install:
bun run build && echo '

Chrome: chrome://extensions/ -> Load unpacked -> select dist/
Firefox: about:debugging -> Load Temporary Add-on -> select dist/manifest.json
'
